projectName: Improving the user interface of 3DÎ¼F, an Interactive Design Environment for Continuous Flow  Microfluidic Devices    June 2021 - Sep 2021
projectContent: Open-source project. A specialized toolset for automating the design process of microfluidic devices.
Contributions to the graphics and user interface elements including zoom sliders, file uploading interface, and tooltips are optimized and updated in Vue.js.

projectName: System design and analysis: A system used to organize in-person and virtual events    Oct 2021
projectContent: Term project. Designed a system for scheduling events. Object-oriented methods; system feasibility; requirements analysis, including user stories, user case, functional & non-functional requirements.
Included UML, class models, sequence diagrams, data flow, main class design and implementation, GUI sketches.

projectName: Pulsed UV Light Inactivation of Salmonella & E. coli in Liquid Egg White.   Aug 2017 - May 2019
projectContent: Master's Thesis. Developed a protocol to decontaminate liquid eggs using pulsed UV systems.
Hands-on experiences in microbiological testing methods, data analysis, method development, and qualifications.
